ComicInfo.Title: Order of Tarot: Part 1
ComicInfo.Summary:
As each member of Tarot makes their move for power, not much escapes the watchful eye of the Empress. And anyone who aspires to take the throne from the Emperor better be prepared to face her wrath...meanwhile as Talisman trains with the Order of Light his feelings for Shimmer continue to grow and with it his salvation from his destiny.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Igor Vitorino & Ivan Nunes | 1 | B | Cover B | Ario Murti & Jesse Heagy | 2 | C | Cover C | Marc Rosete | 3 | D | Cover D | Sheldon Goh & Sanju Nivangune | 4 | E | Cover E | Mike Mahle | 5 | F | Quarterly Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 250 | Elias Chatzoudis | Missing | G | VIP Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 75 | Elias Chatzoudis | Missing | H | Zenescope Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 50 | Elias Chatzoudis | Missing | I | Valentine's Day Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 350 | Elias Chatzoudis | Missing |
